TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SharedElementCallback extends Java.Lang.Object
Public MustInherit Class SharedElementCallback Inherits Object
public ref class SharedElementCallback abstract : Java::Lang::Object

Docs.summary: Listener provided in Activity#setEnterSharedElementCallback(SharedElementCallback) and Activity#setExitSharedElementCallback(SharedElementCallback) as well as Fragment#setEnterSharedElementCallback(SharedElementCallback) and Fragment#setExitSharedElementCallback(SharedElementCallback) to monitor the Shared element transitions.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Android.OS.IParcelable? OnCaptureSharedElementSnapshot (Android.Views.View? sharedElement, Android.Graphics.Matrix? viewToGlobalMatrix, Android.Graphics.RectF? screenBounds);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.OS.IParcelable OnCaptureSharedElementSnapshot(class Android.Views.View sharedElement, class Android.Graphics.Matrix viewToGlobalMatrix, class Android.Graphics.RectF screenBounds) cil managed
Public Overridable Function OnCaptureSharedElementSnapshot (sharedElement As View, viewToGlobalMatrix As Matrix, screenBounds As RectF) As IParcelable

public: virtual Android::OS::IParcelable ^ OnCaptureSharedElementSnapshot(Android::Views::View ^ sharedElement, Android::Graphics::Matrix ^ viewToGlobalMatrix, Android::Graphics::RectF ^ screenBounds);

abstract member OnCaptureSharedElementSnapshot : Android.Views.View * Android.Graphics.Matrix * Android.Graphics.RectF -> Android.OS.IParcelable override this.OnCaptureSharedElementSnapshot : Android.Views.View * Android.Graphics.Matrix * Android.Graphics.RectF -> Android.OS.IParcelable

Docs.param: The shared element View to create a snapshot for.
A matrix containing a transform from the view to the screen coordinates.
The bounds of shared element in screen coordinate space. This is the bounds of the view with the viewToGlobalMatrix applied.
Docs.summary: Creates a snapshot of a shared element to be used by the remote Activity and reconstituted with #onCreateSnapshotView(android.content.Context, android.os.Parcelable).
Docs.returns: A snapshot to send to the remote Activity to be reconstituted with #onCreateSnapshotView(android.content.Context, android.os.Parcelable) and passed into #onSharedElementStart(java.util.List, java.util.List, java.util.List) and #onSharedElementEnd(java.util.List, java.util.List, java.util.List).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Android.Views.View? OnCreateSnapshotView (Android.Content.Context? context, Android.OS.IParcelable? snapshot);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.View OnCreateSnapshotView(class Android.Content.Context context, class Android.OS.IParcelable snapshot) cil managed
Public Overridable Function OnCreateSnapshotView (context As Context, snapshot As IParcelable) As View
public: virtual Android::Views::View ^ OnCreateSnapshotView(Android::Content::Context ^ context, Android::OS::IParcelable ^ snapshot);

abstract member OnCreateSnapshotView : Android.Content.Context * Android.OS.IParcelable -> Android.Views.View override this.OnCreateSnapshotView : Android.Content.Context * Android.OS.IParcelable -> Android.Views.View

Docs.param: The Context used to create the snapshot View.
The Parcelable returned by #onCaptureSharedElementSnapshot( android.view.View, android.graphics.Matrix, android.graphics.RectF).
Docs.summary: Reconstitutes a snapshot View from a Parcelable returned in #onCaptureSharedElementSnapshot(android.view.View, android.graphics.Matrix, android.graphics.RectF) to be used in #onSharedElementStart(java.util.List, java.util.List, java.util.List) and #onSharedElementEnd(java.util.List, java.util.List, java.util.List).
Docs.returns: A View to be sent in #onSharedElementStart(java.util.List, java.util.List, java.util.List) and #onSharedElementEnd(java.util.List, java.util.List, java.util.List). A null value will produce a null snapshot value for those two methods.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

abstract member OnMapSharedElements : System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> * System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, Android.Views.View> -> unit override this.OnMapSharedElements : System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> * System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, Android.Views.View> -> unit

Docs.param: The names of all shared elements transferred from the calling Activity or Fragment in the order they were provided.
The mapping of shared element names to Views. The best guess will be filled into sharedElements based on the transitionNames.
Docs.summary: Lets the SharedElementCallback adjust the mapping of shared element names to Views.

Public Overridable Sub OnRejectSharedElements (rejectedSharedElements As IList(Of View))

abstract member OnRejectSharedElements : System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Views.View> -> unit override this.OnRejectSharedElements : System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Views.View> -> unit

Docs.param: Views containing visual information of shared elements that are not part of the entering scene. These Views are positioned relative to the Window decor View. A View removed from this list will not be transitioned automatically.
Docs.summary: Called after #onMapSharedElements(java.util.List, java.util.Map) when transferring shared elements in.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void OnSharedElementEnd (System.Collections.Generic.IList<string>? sharedElementNames, System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Views.View>? sharedElements, System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Views.View>? sharedElementSnapshots);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSharedElementEnd(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> sharedElementNames, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Views.View> sharedElements, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Views.View> sharedElementSnapshots) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub OnSharedElementEnd (sharedElementNames As IList(Of String), sharedElements As IList(Of View), sharedElementSnapshots As IList(Of View))

public: virtual void OnSharedElementEnd(System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::String ^> ^ sharedElementNames, System::Collections::Generic::IList<Android::Views::View ^> ^ sharedElements, System::Collections::Generic::IList<Android::Views::View ^> ^ sharedElementSnapshots);

abstract member OnSharedElementEnd : System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Views.View> * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Views.View> -> unit override this.OnSharedElementEnd : System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Views.View> * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Views.View> -> unit

Docs.param: The names of the shared elements that were accepted into the View hierarchy.
The shared elements that are part of the View hierarchy.

The Views containing snap shots of the shared element from the launching Window. These elements will not be part of the scene, but will be positioned relative to the Window decor View. This list will be null for Fragment Transitions.
Docs.summary: In Activity Transitions, onSharedElementEnd is called immediately before capturing the end of the shared element state on enter and reenter transitions and immediately before capturing the start of the shared element state for exit and return transitions.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSharedElementsArrived(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> sharedElementNames, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Views.View> sharedElements, class Android.App.SharedElementCallback/IOnSharedElementsReadyListener listener) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub OnSharedElementsArrived (sharedElementNames As IList(Of String), sharedElements As IList(Of View), listener As SharedElementCallback.IOnSharedElementsReadyListener)

public: virtual void OnSharedElementsArrived(System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::String ^> ^ sharedElementNames, System::Collections::Generic::IList<Android::Views::View ^> ^ sharedElements, Android::App::SharedElementCallback::IOnSharedElementsReadyListener ^ listener);

abstract member OnSharedElementsArrived : System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Views.View> * Android.App.SharedElementCallback.IOnSharedElementsReadyListener -> unit override this.OnSharedElementsArrived : System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Views.View> * Android.App.SharedElementCallback.IOnSharedElementsReadyListener -> unit

Docs.param: The names of the shared elements that are being transferred..
The shared elements that are part of the View hierarchy.
The listener to call when the shared elements are ready to be hidden in the source Activity or shown in the destination Activity.
Docs.summary: Called during an Activity Transition when the shared elements have arrived at the final location and are ready to be transferred.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSharedElementStart(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> sharedElementNames, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Views.View> sharedElements, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Views.View> sharedElementSnapshots) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub OnSharedElementStart (sharedElementNames As IList(Of String), sharedElements As IList(Of View), sharedElementSnapshots As IList(Of View))

public: virtual void OnSharedElementStart(System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::String ^> ^ sharedElementNames, System::Collections::Generic::IList<Android::Views::View ^> ^ sharedElements, System::Collections::Generic::IList<Android::Views::View ^> ^ sharedElementSnapshots);

abstract member OnSharedElementStart : System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Views.View> * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Views.View> -> unit override this.OnSharedElementStart : System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Views.View> * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Views.View> -> unit

Docs.param: The names of the shared elements that were accepted into the View hierarchy.
The shared elements that are part of the View hierarchy.

The Views containing snap shots of the shared element from the launching Window. These elements will not be part of the scene, but will be positioned relative to the Window decor View. This list is null for Fragment Transitions.
Docs.summary: In Activity Transitions, onSharedElementStart is called immediately before capturing the start of the shared element state on enter and reenter transitions and immediately before capturing the end of the shared element state for exit and return transitions.
